Leon's Blog(n) v.1.9.8.4

Started Internship!

04 May 2022

Started my internship at Ecopia! Everybody is super nice and the work is super interesting.

Tried the beginning of the trumpet part of gordon goodwin’s Backrow Politics on alto, very fun!

Trying to learn "Love me right" by Exo, but it’s extremely fast.

Going home tomorrow!

16 Apr 2022

I should add a script to unmute on fullscreen in the animations section! Also need a script to kill local runs of this blog. Also should sort videos by date in sports section

Trying to learn the rainbow flick, but it’s hard to keep it in the air after it goes over my head.

Also learned some swing dancing yesterday! I am very not used to dancing 6/8 moves in 4/4 time.

Going home in a week!

10 Apr 2022

Competed at the Ontario University Atheltic’s Fencing competition last weekend!

Did okish. First time competing in Sabre! Was pretty interesting to learn on the fly.

Had my PDES final today (was very hard). Have a couple projects and another final left!

Terms almost over

03 Mar 2022

Animated a bit today.

Also trying to get jupyter notebook to work on heroku.

Reading weeks almost over

24 Feb 2022

Learned how a pair of human eyes can calculate depth of objects.

Excited to go Toronto this weekend. Also excited for the fencing competition happening in a month.

Lost wallet recently, I appreciate the convenience of credits card a lot more now.
